tool_description: Geocodify is a free, simple-to-use, enterprise-grade geocoding, geoparsing, address parsing, elevation and maps api that allows you to build location aware applications.
title: Geocodify

api_list.name: GeoCode
api_list.description: This provides the longitude, latitude and place details based on a search query, be it an address, a name of a place or a location.
